header: Reimagining the Indian investor experience with cart for stocks and mutual funds
description: Introducing e-commerce patterns into fintech by building a cart feature to allow users to seamlessly make multiple financial transactions.

header: Building an Apple Watch app to enhance the BookMyShow experience
description: Identifying the most critical features of the ticket-booking mobile app BookMyShow with about 70 million users, to design an Apple Watch app experience.

description: FLeverage is an online community for filmmaking enthusiasts who are just starting out, to find gigs, connect, network, and engage in healthy competition to hone their skills.

header: Teaching Indian investors about tax by designing a tax-savings investments tracker
description: This tax-saving investment tracker makes taxes less intimidating by allowing users to easily find ways to save tax and track their tax-saving investments.
